Question.Subject: surprise romantic cheap date night san francisco?
Question.Content: looking for a surprise spot to take my bf. a bar would be nice but also something extremely unique. i would like to have one of those super random surprisingly nice nights out...suggestions? o and the cheaper the better (we are trying to save money now, sooo..thatd b helpful) thanks

ChosenAnswer: Why not put together a bottle of champagne, a picnic and have a date on Treasure Island. Cheap, great view, time together.

Answers.Answer: There are plenty of cheap restaurants. Try SanFranGuide.com
